tool_description: Learn more about your prospect/client/supplier/partner in no time
name: Companies Data
title: Companies Data

api_list.name: Referential

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Two letter country ISO code (e.g. 'fr' for France)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://companies-data1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/fr/companies/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "companies-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://companies-data1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/{country}/companies/{page_number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "companies-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Data
api_list.description: Returns company details for one or more SIREN numbers

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Two letter country ISO code (e.g. 'fr' for France)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://companies-data1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/fr/profiles/819451527"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "companies-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://companies-data1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/{country}/profiles/{siren}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "companies-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
